member.name: P:Jurassic.PKS.Service.Submission.SubmissionOption.Contact
member.remarks: 可以提供多个联系方式，使用“|”分割。如”email:z3@a.com | qq:12345 | wc:3214 | tel: 18601234567”

member.name: P:Jurassic.PKS.Service.Submission.SubmissionOption.Application
